snippet: On his radio show, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said he would not speak out against Bill de Blasio, saying, “These jobs are tough enough without an extra voice criticizing you.”
abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, known to be outspoken in his opinions, says he will refrain from criticizing successor Bill de Blasio.
lead_paragraph: On his radio show, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said he would not speak out against Bill de Blasio, saying, “These jobs are tough enough without an extra voice criticizing you.”

headline.main: Out of Office, Bloomberg Says, He’ll Stay Mum on Successor
headline.print_headline: Out of Office, Mayor Says, He’ll Stay Mum on Successor
